description.zh-cn: 汉代、三国时期的地名，其旧址位于现在的江苏省睢宁县古邳镇，清朝因地震治所迁往今邳州市。
description.en: A place name from the Han Dynasty and Three Kingdoms period. Its original site is located in modern-day Gupi Town, Suining County, Jiangsu Province. After an earthquake during the Qing Dynasty, its administrative center was moved to modern-day Pizhou City.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上继春秋时期之后的一段时期。
description.en: A period in ancient Chinese history following the Spring and Autumn period.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期田齐的第三位君主，他将邹忌封于下邳。
description.en: The third monarch of the state of Tian Qi during the Warring States period, who enfeoffed Zou Ji at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 战国时期齐国政治家，被齐威王封为下邳成侯。
description.en: A politician of the State of Qi during the Warring States period, who was made Marquis Cheng of Xiapī by King Wei of Qi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一种爵位，邹忌被封于下邳为此爵。
description.en: An ancient Chinese noble title. Zou Ji was granted this title with a fief at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝时期的一个郡，下邳隶属该郡。
description.en: A commandery during the Qin Dynasty to which Xiapī belonged.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个郡，下邳隶属该郡。
description.en: A commandery during the Western Han Dynasty to which Xiapī belonged.

description.zh-cn: 汉朝开国皇帝，史称汉高祖。他改封韩信为楚王。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Han Dynasty, known as Emperor Gaozu of Han. He re-enfeoffed Han Xin as the King of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 西汉开国功臣，被刘邦封为楚王后，定都于下邳。
description.en: A founding general of the Western Han Dynasty. After being made the King of Chu by Liu Bang, he established his capital at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期的一个郡，是韩信所封楚国的主要区域。
description.en: A commandery during the Western Han Dynasty, which was the main territory of the Kingdom of Chu enfeoffed to Han Xin.

description.zh-cn: 东汉时期由汉明帝设立的侯国，治所位于下邳。
description.en: A kingdom established by Emperor Ming of Han during the Eastern Han Dynasty, with its capital at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 东汉第二位皇帝，于公元72年建立下邳国。
description.en: The second emperor of the Eastern Han Dynasty, who established the Kingdom of Xiapī in 72 AD.

description.zh-cn: 汉明帝之子，被封为第一任下邳王。
description.en: Son of Emperor Ming of Han, who was enfeoffed as the first King of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 中国历史上的一段时期，在此期间下邳是徐州的治所。
description.en: A period in Chinese history, during which Xiapī was the administrative center of Xu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的九州之一，三国时期治所设在下邳。
description.en: One of the Nine Provinces of ancient China. During the Three Kingdoms period, its administrative center was at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个郡，曾在不同朝代设立。
description.en: An ancient Chinese commandery established in various dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 地名，位于今江苏省宿迁市。在隋朝是下邳郡的治所。
description.en: A place name, located in modern-day Suqian, Jiangsu. It was the administrative center of Xiapī Commandery during the Sui Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一个州，唐朝时下邳隶属该州。
description.en: An ancient Chinese prefecture (zhou), to which Xiapī belonged during the Tang Dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的军事藩镇，后周时期下邳属其管辖。
description.en: A military governorship in ancient China. Xiapī was under its jurisdiction during the Later Zhou period.

description.zh-cn: 宋、金时期的一个军事建制州，下邳隶属该州。
description.en: A military prefecture (jun) during the Song and Jin dynasties, to which Xiapī belonged.

description.zh-cn: 元朝的一个府，下邳隶属该府。
description.en: A prefecture (fu) during the Yuan Dynasty, to which Xiapī belonged.

description.zh-cn: 明朝的行政区划，下邳隶属该区。
description.en: An administrative division of the Ming Dynasty, to which Xiapī belonged.

description.zh-cn: 清朝康熙年间发生于山东郯城的一场大地震，导致下邳治所迁移。
description.en: A major earthquake that occurred in Tancheng, Shandong during the reign of the Kangxi Emperor of the Qing Dynasty, which caused the relocation of the administrative center of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 位于江苏省的县级市，是清朝郯城大地震后下邳的新治所所在地。
description.en: A county-level city in Jiangsu Province, which became the new administrative seat of Xiapī after the Tancheng earthquake in the Qing dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期设立的县，1953年被分拆并入睢宁县和邳县。
description.en: A county established during the Republic of China period, which was partitioned and merged into Suining County and Pi County in 1953.

description.zh-cn: 齐威王封邹忌为下邳的成侯。
description.en: King Wei of Qi enfeoffed Zou Ji as Marquis Cheng of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 被封为下邳的成侯。
description.en: Was enfeoffed as Marquis Cheng of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 因邹忌被封于此，该地开始称为“下邳”。
description.en: Because Zou Ji was enfeoffed here, the place began to be called 'Xiapī'.

description.zh-cn: 秦朝时期，下邳隶属于东晦郡。
description.en: During the Qin dynasty, Xiapī belonged to Donghui Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 西汉时期，下邳隶属于东海郡。
description.en: During the Western Han dynasty, Xiapī belonged to Donghai Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 刘邦改封韩信为楚王。
description.en: Liu Bang re-enfeoffed Han Xin as the King of Chu.

description.zh-cn: 韩信成为楚王后，将楚国国都定在下邳。
description.en: After becoming the King of Chu, Han Xin established the capital of his kingdom at Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 公元72年，汉明帝成立了下邳国。
description.en: In 72 AD, Emperor Ming of Han established the Kingdom of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 汉明帝封他的儿子刘衍为下邳王。
description.en: Emperor Ming of Han enfeoffed his son Liu Yan as the King of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 刘衍是下邳国的第一任国王。
description.en: Liu Yan was the first king of the Kingdom of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 东汉与西晋时期，下邳隶属于下邳国。
description.en: During the Eastern Han and Western Jin dynasties, Xiapī belonged to the Kingdom of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 在东汉与西晋时期，下邳是下邳国的治所。
description.en: During the Eastern Han and Western Jin dynasties, Xiapī was the administrative center of the Kingdom of Xiapī.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期，下邳隶属于徐州。
description.en: During the Three Kingdoms period, Xiapī belonged to Xu Province.

description.zh-cn: 三国时期，下邳是徐州的治所。
description.en: During the Three Kingdoms period, Xiapī was the administrative center of Xu Province.

description.zh-cn: 北魏与隋朝时期，下邳隶属于下邳郡。
description.en: During the Northern Wei and Sui dynasties, Xiapī belonged to Xiapī Commandery.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝时期，下邳郡的治所是宿豫。
description.en: During the Sui dynasty, the administrative center of Xiapī Commandery was Suyu.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝时期，下邳隶属于泗州。
description.en: During the Tang dynasty, Xiapī belonged to Sizhou.

description.zh-cn: 后周时期，下邳属于武宁节度使管辖。
description.en: During the Later Zhou period, Xiapī was under the jurisdiction of the Wuning Jiedushi.

description.zh-cn: 北宋与金朝时期，下邳隶属于淮阳军。
description.en: During the Northern Song and Jin dynasties, Xiapī belonged to Huaiyang Jun.

description.zh-cn: 元朝时期，下邳隶属于归德府。
description.en: During the Yuan dynasty, Xiapī belonged to Guide Fu.

description.zh-cn: 明朝时期，下邳隶属于南直隶。
description.en: During the Ming dynasty, Xiapī belonged to the Southern Directly-Ruled Area.

description.zh-cn: 清朝年间的郯城大地震导致下邳都城由古邳镇迁往今天的邳州市。
description.en: The Tancheng earthquake during the Qing dynasty caused the capital of Xiapī to be moved from Gupi Town to modern-day Pizhou.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，邳睢县南部被划入睢宁县。
description.en: In 1953, the southern part of Pisui County was incorporated into Suining County.

description.zh-cn: 1953年，邳睢县北部被划入邳县。
description.en: In 1953, the northern part of Pisui County was incorporated into Pi County.
